snippet: The company planned to move locomotive production to other operations in North and South America after contract talks with unionized workers soured.
abstract: Caterpillar will close a Canadian locomotive factory that employs about 670 people, after contract talks with unionized workers sour; production from Electro-Motive Canada in Ontario will be moved to other operations in North and South America.
lead_paragraph: The company planned to move locomotive production to other operations in North and South America after contract talks with unionized workers soured.

headline.seo: Caterpillar to Close Assembly Factory in Canada
headline.main: Caterpillar to Close Assembly Factory in Canada
headline.print_headline: Caterpillar to Close Assembly Factory in Canada
